p: In conclusion, the present study demonstrated that Lantana montevidensis leaf essential oil was ineffective in scavenging the DPPH radical, but exhibited reducing activity in vitro. Exposure of Drosophila melanogaster to L. montevidensis leaf essential oil (0.12â€“0.48 g/mL) for 5 h did not significantly alter markers of oxidative, as evidenced by there being no change in total thiol, GSH, and MDA contents.
